title: GDG DevFest Hyderabad 2017
description: GDG Hyderabad invites you to the worldwide celebrations of developers and technological innovations. Join us as we celebrate 6th season of DevFest. #gdghyd #hyddevfest17
keywords: event, gdg, gde, hyderabad, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
motto: All about Android, Web and Machine Learning.
subscribeNote: GDG Hyderabad is an independent group; our activities and the opinions expressed here should in no way be linked to Google, the corporation.
ticketsDetails: The one day event includes a series of uber cool tech-talks, hands-on sessions on latest technologies, code labs and all through the way it will be fun and interactive. Infotainment is the anthem of our event. We bring the perfect amalgamation of diverse topics from the developer’s world to the community.

locationDescription: Hyderabad, the City of Pearls, one of the most dynamic cities across the world with an exponential growth of Tech & Startup community
aboutOrganizers: GDG Hyderabad celebrates the spirit of being a developer. Hyderabad DevFest can be considered as “Technical Diwali” that celebrates the achievements of computing world and the constant urge to connect, code and innovate. GDG Hyderabad believes that technology is not only easy to apply in our daily lives but it is also easy to build one on our own. And since, to learn something there are no constraints, anyone can attend the session and get a hands-on idea of the the latest developments of technical world.
aboutGdg:
GDG DevFests are large, community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas, all-day hack-a-thons, code labs, and more. Each GDG DevFest will be inspired by and uniquely tailored to the needs of the developer community that hosts it. 
 
 While no two events will be exactly alike, each GDG DevFest will, at its core, be powered by a shared belief that when developers come together to exchange ideas, amazing things can happen.
teamPageText:
19 years ago, a dream to make knowledge accessible universally came true. Fast forward to 2017, Google has grown into not just a firm that believes in its roots of continuous learning and sharing but also has become an integral part of our daily lives, as they say “googling around the world”.

At GDG Hyderabad, we believe in sharing the same values and expanding to more avenues of collaborating and co-developing ideas to build a creative and innovative platform for developers, technologists and passionate minds.

GDG Hyderabad is an open community run by the diverse and inspiring enthusiasm of its members. Our team is thus driven by this love for bringing an impactful change in the society with the power of technology and community spirit.
